element.name: Shaw's Woods by Hezekiah, Multi-cache (1/1.5)

center.font: Visit the new Geocaching Ireland discussion forum HERE

element.long-description:
Shaw's Woods lie in the area now known as Bushy Park - originally part of a large estate owned by the Shaw family. There is plenty of parking in the area, and the buses serving the park are 15B, 16, 16A and 47.
The coordinates given are for a feature in the park - to find the cache, you will need to gather a small amount of information :
At these coordinates, how many pillars support the front of the structure (A)
How many steps up to the structure? (B)
How many park benches are there placed around the nearby duck pond(C)?
Construct the cache coordinates as follows : N 53 18.AB1 ; W006 1(C-A).A(B-A)4

ul.li:
2010-06-12T19:00:00Z : Found it by BlueFoxPL
Another great day for caching... found with some friends. TFTC.

2010-06-12T19:00:00Z : Found it by Wicca Cailín
Must have picked the worst day to go for this one, the park was full. And a group of them decided to hang around exactly were I had to look!! Got in and out eventually. Found with Blue Fox PL. TFTC.

2010-06-12T19:00:00Z : Found it by colmyster
Nice spot but far too many mugglers for my liking. TFTC In:dinosaur

2010-04-18T19:00:00Z : Found it by Toffee Man
Found cache easily enough after a nice walk around the park. I used to play football in this park many years ago & never realised that this part existed. TFTC Toffee Man #302

2010-04-11T19:00:00Z : Found it by AbbeyAckbar
(#622 @ 13:50) We had done the stages of this multi along time ago but as light was fading when we got to the cache site we decided to leave it to another day to locate the container. Forward-wind probably a year later....We didn't bother using the GPSr, we just started looking around were it had brought us to last time. As we couldn't find anything, we looked at the hint. After a few minutes we realised we had read the hint incorrectly and were consequently looking in the wrong spot [:P] Although muggles were a plenty at this location on such a sunny day we still managed to retrieve the container sign the log and replace unseen.
TFTC!

2008-09-26T07:10:47Z : Needs Maintenance by Kersti.com
Sorry, should have logged the maintenance call two weeks ago - log book totally soaked and mouldy.

2008-09-13T19:00:00Z : Found it by Kersti.com
Find #197 A gorgeous park and a fairly obvious place. Unfortunately the log is totally soaked through and mouldy so we didn't sign it. Dropped off a TB.

groundspeak:cache.groundspeak:name: Shaw's Woods

groundspeak:cache.groundspeak:long_description:
Shaw's Woods lie in the area now known as Bushy Park - originally part of a large estate owned by the Shaw family. There is plenty of parking in the area, and the buses serving the park are 15B, 16, 16A and 47.

How many steps up to the structure? (B)

How many park benches are there placed around the nearby duck pond(C)?

N 53 18.AB1 ; W006 1(C-A).A(B-A)4
